amendment.description: Amendment transfers $500,000 from the NextGen account to the aviation safety activities account for the purpose of funding a study of implementing a Verbal Warning System for low air speed.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to transfer $500,000 from the NextGen account to the aviation safety activities account for the purpose of funding a study of implementing a Verbal Warning System for low air speed.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Speier amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.
